name: reusable-node
description: Plugin for defining and executing reusable flows
author: AutoMFlows Team

nodes.label: Reusable
nodes.description: Defines a reusable flow with a context name

nodes.label: End
nodes.description: Marks the end of a reusable flow

nodes.label: Run Reusable
nodes.description: Executes a reusable flow by matching its context name
